lead_paragraph: Conservative thinkers have felt emboldened to press their party to reshape its canon to more directly benefit the workers it has often taken for granted.

headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Pushed to Alter Views to Aid Workers
headline.main: They Want Trump to Make the G.O.P. a Workers’ Party

snippet: Conservative thinkers have felt emboldened to press their party to reshape its canon to more directly benefit the workers it has often taken for granted....
abstract: So-called reform conservatives see Donald J Trump's rise in politics as chance to reshape Republican Party; agenda includes expanding tax breaks for low- and middle-income workers, helping displaced workers, rejecting any effort to fully privatize Social Security and pushing for market-oriented changes to Affordable Care Act.
